summary:
------------------------------------------------------------
ENB-EternalNight - ENB for lovers of dark colors, and those who can not afford a voracious ENB.

Advantages:
In practice, does not consume resources
-Due to filtering, you can disable or reduce the anti-aliasing on slower machines, without loss of image quality.
-ENB has a soft warm colors and a unique color filter.
-Please those who enjoy good visibility at night.
-Makes a fantastic atmosphere Skyrim

Installation:

Copy the contents of the archive to a folder with the game. (NO DATA!!!)

Changes in v1.3:
-Changed blur effect it at night.
-Usiliny artificial sources of light.
-The work on adjusting the daylight.
-Fixed a bug with transparent hands, spells disaster for the use of \"Fire.\"

- Reduced drawdown FPS on slower machines.
